name: apis/nftport/v0/NFT transactions retriever
description:
Returns all on-chain transactions for the specified NFT token, using the NFTPort API. Can be set to include transactions such as transfer, burn, mint, and sale, or all which includes all transactions. 
Supports Ethereum only.

Retrieve transactions by NFT:
https://docs.nftport.xyz/docs/nftport/b3A6MzAxNDQ3NzU-retrieve-transactions-by-nft

d6176d1f-fbe4-4da3-8727-618b627dff92.type:
{
  "contract_address": string,
  "token_id": string,
    optional "continuation": string,
  optional "page_size": number,
  optional "type": ("transfer" or "mint" or "burn" or "sale" or "all")[]
}
d6176d1f-fbe4-4da3-8727-618b627dff92.name: query
d6176d1f-fbe4-4da3-8727-618b627dff92.description:
Receives search query.

Rerefence:
https://docs.nftport.xyz/docs/nftport/b3A6MzAxNDQ3NzU-retrieve-transactions-by-nft#Request

Default type value: "all"

c74ef5b6-1c9b-49f2-9444-e64dd26fc0eb.name: data
